name: Athletics
description: Increases the Movement Speed bonus of Sprint by 3% for each piece of Medium Armor equipped.  Current bonus: 0%.  Reduces the cost of Roll Dodge by 4% for each piece of Medium Armor equipped.  Current bonus: 0%.
